title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Strawb with a response to someone claiming there’s no first amendment issue with Ken Paxton’s investigation into Media Matters: That’s because you don’t understand the first amendment, Koby. For those of us that do, there’s very much a violation going on here. In second […]
